element.label: LineItemComponent for IDR. Ignore in DD Generation
element.definition: LineItemComponent definition.

element.label: Line Item Sequence Number
element.definition: This variable identifies an individual line number on a claim.

element.label: Line Item Sequence Number
element.definition: This field represents the item's HCPCS code, if available.

element.label: Line Item Sequence Number
element.definition: This field contains one of two potential pieces of data; the Ambulatory Payment Classification (APC) code or the Health Insurance Prospective Payment System (HIPPS) code, which corresponds with the revenue center line for the claim.

element.label: Revenue Center National Drug Code
element.definition: This field may contain one of three types of identifiers: the National Drug Code (NDC), the Universal Product Code (UPC), or the number assigned by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) to an investigational device (IDE) after the manufacturer has approval to conduct a clinical trial.

element.label: Line Item NDC quantity
element.definition: This field represents the NDC quantity of the drug provided.

element.label: Line Item NDC quantity qualifier code
element.definition: This field represents the NDC quantity qualifier code of the drug provided.

element.label: Line Item service unit quantity
element.definition: This field represents the quantity of the service provided on the line item.

element.label: Line Item Revenue Center Code
element.definition: The provider-assigned revenue code for each cost center for which a separate charge is billed (type of accommodation or ancillary).

element.label: Line Item Revenue Center Code
element.definition: Code indicating whether the revenue center charges are subject to deductible and/or coinsurance.

element.label: HCPCS Modifier code 1
element.definition: The first code to modify the HCPCS procedure code associated with the claim-line. This provides more specific procedure identification for the line-item service.

element.label: HCPCS Modifier code 2
element.definition: The second code to modify the HCPCS procedure code associated with the claim-line. This provides more specific procedure identification for the line-item service.

element.label: HCPCS Modifier code 3
element.definition: The third code to modify the HCPCS procedure code associated with the claim-line. This provides more specific procedure identification for the line-item service.

element.label: HCPCS Modifier code 4
element.definition: The fourth code to modify the HCPCS procedure code associated with the claim-line. This provides more specific procedure identification for the line-item service.

element.label: HCPCS Modifier code 5
element.definition: The fifth code to modify the HCPCS procedure code associated with the claim-line. This provides more specific procedure identification for the line-item service.

element.label: Claim Line Institutional Rate Amount
element.definition: Charges relating to unit cost associated with the revenue center code.

element.label: Claim Line Adjustment reason code 1
element.definition: The first code used to identify the detailed reason an adjustment was made (e.g. reason for denial or reducing payment).

element.label: Claim Line Adjustment reason code 1
element.definition: The second code used to identify the detailed reason an adjustment was made (e.g. reason for denial or reducing payment).

element.label: Claim Line Adjustment reason code 1
element.definition: The third code used to identify the detailed reason an adjustment was made (e.g. reason for denial or reducing payment).

element.label: Claim Line Adjustment reason code 1
element.definition: The fourth code used to identify the detailed reason an adjustment was made (e.g. reason for denial or reducing payment).

element.label: Claim Line Adjustment reason code 1
element.definition: The fifth code used to identify the detailed reason an adjustment was made (e.g. reason for denial or reducing payment).

element.label: Revenue Center Non-Covered Charge Amount
element.definition: The charge amount related to a revenue center code for services that are not covered by Medicare.

element.label: Revenue Center Provider Payment Amount
element.definition: The amount Medicare paid for the services reported on the revenue center record.

element.label: Revenue Center Patient Responsibility Payment Amount
element.definition: The amount paid by the beneficiary to the provider for the line-item service.

element.label: Claim Line Beneficiary Paid Amount
element.definition: The amount paid to the beneficiary for the services reported on the line item.

element.label: Claim Line Covered Paid Amount
element.definition: The amount Medicare paid for the services reported on the revenue center record.

element.label: Claim Line Blood Deductible Amount
element.definition: This variable is the dollar amount the beneficiary is responsible for related to the deductible for blood products that appear on the revenue center record.

element.label: Part B Deductible Amount
element.definition: The amount of the cash deductible as submitted on the claim. This variable is the beneficiary’s liability under the annual Part B deductible for all line items on the claim; it is the sum of all line-level deductible amounts.

element.label: Revenue Center Coinsurance/Wage Adjusted Coinsurance Amount
element.definition: This variable is the beneficiary’s liability for coinsurance for the revenue center record.

element.label: Revenue Center Reduced Coinsurance Amount
element.definition: For all services subject to Outpatient prospective payment system (PPS or OPPS), the amount of coinsurance applicable to the line for a particular service (as indicated by the HCPCS code) for which the provider has elected to reduce the coinsurance amount.

element.label: Revenue Center 1st Medicare Secondary Payer Paid Amount
element.definition: The amount paid by the primary payer when the payer is primary to Medicare (Medicare is a secondary).

element.label: Revenue Center 2nd Medicare Secondary Payer Paid Amount
element.definition: The amount paid by the secondary payer when two payers are primary to Medicare (Medicare is the tertiary payer).

element.label: Revenue Center Date
element.definition: This is the date of service for the revenue center record.
